column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Finally!  Deep dish pizza
column2: I loved! Being a tourist and trying to find that pizza w legit reviews got me on a deep dish pizza hunt. I tried Giordano's first
column3: wasn't so impressed. Came here hoping this place wouldn't let me down... it sure did not! Enjoyed a glass of red to accompany my delicious pizza. The sausage spread at the bottom
column4: the flavors n sauce was in sync on  combination and the crust tied it perfectly together.  Shall be dreaming of this forever
